title: Nail Polish
description: Gel-like perfection on your nails is now as easy as a single stroke with Lakme Absolute Gel Stylist nail colours. Its high shine formula and gel-like consistency delivers stunning nails with intense colour payoff. The unique and innovative brush glides easily onto nails in one easy swipe and can be used to create eye-catchy nail art as well. With rich and deep colours

title: Nail Polish
description: This shade from Maybelline called Midnight Red (Super stay Gel range) is worth the price. Perfect shade for wearing in winter.The texture is flawless and even a single coat does wonders.Flipkart service and packaging was indeed remarkable.

title: Nail Polish
description: Now get One Stroke Bold Color with the new Nail Pops. Flaunt vibrant nails that look like they've just been through a pop manicure! The New Elle 18 Nail Pops Nail Color gives a glossy, fun colour to your nails and with so many shades of nail colours to choose from there's one for every mood and occasion and all this in Just One Stroke. The Elle 18 Nail Pops are a collection specially designed for the excited you who need a new shade for every mood and occasion, be it a college party, or festival, there's always a nail pop for you.

title: Nail Polish

title: Nail Art
description: Our Budget nail extension with nail art kit is the best-selling kit of all time, and it will help you obtain everything you need in one kit. It’s ideal for beginners, experienced nail artists looking to improve their abilities, salon professionals, nail technicians, and salon start-ups. The kit comes with all of the necessary high-quality items, such as gel and acrylic systems, gel polishes, and professional tools and machines. Basically, it includes everything you need to get started, including application methods, techniques, and stunning nail art. It aids in the creation of strong, long-lasting nails with a luxurious appearance, feel, and finish. We also include complete instruction and counselling from our experienced nail trainers, including information on the products, their applications, application techniques, and vital tricks & tips, as well as business consultation.

brand: Lotus Nail Decal Flower Nail Wrap Lotus Nail Art Set
title: Nail Art
description:
28 Lotus Flower Nail Wrap Decals by NAILTHINS

    You will receive a total of 28 of the primary pictured Lotus flower nail decals.
    These designs will arrive in three size widths, 8mm wide, 6mm wide, and 4mm wide.

title: Nail Polish remover
description:
Remove your old nail lacquer instantly and gently with the Blue Heaven Instant Nail Paint Remover - (28ml). It is infused with the goodness of vitamin E to nourish your nails, and its active ingredients boost the growth of your nails. Moreover, this Blue Heaven nail polish remover conditions your nails to prevent dryness and brittleness.
    Enriched with vitamin E that nourishes your nails
    Conditions your nails to prevent dryness and brittleness
    Nail polish remover offers effortless removal of nail paints
    Acetone-free nail polish remover for safe use

title: Nail Polish remover
description:
One-swipe removal: Enhanced with rich hydrating and nourishing ingredients, this nail polish remover strips away all traces of lacquer in just a single swipe.
    Nourishes nail beds: It is enriched with the goodness of olive oil to moisturise, hydrate and protect nails while removing the nail polish.
    Conditions and protects: It is infused with Green Tea Extracts & Vitamin E to keep the nails in good health, while strengthening them.
    Acetone- free : It has a unique formula that does not contain acetone, paraben or SLS.
